Posts.Title: Anyone taking Adriamycin for Chemo Lovelyface Lovelyface

Posts.Content: Oct 14, 2010 12:25PM winter1NY wrote: Hi all I don't like closed MRI's either. This is what they did for me: got rx for valium (small dosage) and went in feet first, face down, which I guess must be standard for a breast MRI; but what really helped was they positioned a mirror angled up in front of my face so I could see the room which made it feel less closed in   hope this helps
